languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} всегда с нами, {mf|господин|госпожа}. Вы вообще видели статую снаружи? Ее сложно пропустить — из любой щели заметна. Бессмертный присматривает за нами, и раз еще не разнес жалкую станцию с этим баром в придачу на кусочки — Его все устраивает".

traits.locale_text: "Император всегда с нами, {mf|господин|госпожа}. Вы вообще видели статую снаружи? Ее сложно пропустить — из любой щели заметна. Бессмертный присматривает за нами, и раз еще не разнес эту жалкую станцию с этим баром впридачу на кусочки — его все устраивает".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is always with us, {mf|sir|ma'am}. Did you even see the statue outside? It's kinda hard to miss. The thing is visible through every crack. The Immortal One watches over us, and since He hasn't yet blown this sorry excuse for a station to smithereens — and this bar along with it — I guess it suits Him just fine."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} всегда с нами, {mf|господин|госпожа}. Вы вообще видели статую снаружи? Ее сложно пропустить — из любой щели заметна. Бессмертный присматривает за нами, и раз еще не разнес жалкую станцию с этим баром в придачу на кусочки — Его все устраивает".

traits.locale_text: "The Emperor is always with us, {mf|sir|ma'am}. Did you even see the statue outside? It's kinda hard to miss — the thing is visible through every crack. The Immortal One watches over us, and since He hasn't yet blown this pipsqueak of a station along with this bar to smithereens — I guess it suits Him just fine."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

The Immortal One watches over us, and since He hasn't yet blown this sorry excuse for a station to smithereens — and this bar along with it — I guess it suits Him just fine."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}一直都与我们同在，{mf|先生|女士}。你应该看到外面的雕像了吧？恐怕不会有人看不到它。无论你在什么地方，都能看到那座雕像。不朽神皇守护着我们。而且，既然祂还没有把这座破破烂烂的星站，连同这间酒吧一起化为灰烬，那我猜祂应该觉得还行。”
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is always with us, {mf|sir|ma'am}. Did you even see the statue outside? It's kinda hard to miss. The thing is visible through every crack. The Immortal One watches over us, and since He hasn't yet blown this sorry excuse for a station to smithereens — and this bar along with it — I guess it suits Him just fine."

traits.locale_text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}一直都与我们同在，{mf|先生|女士}。你应该看到外面的雕像了吧？恐怕不会有人看不到它。无论你在什么地方，都能看到那座雕像。不朽神皇守护着我们。而且，既然祂还没有把这座破破烂烂的星站，连同这间酒吧一起化为灰烬，那我猜祂应该觉得还行。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: «El {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} no nos abandona, {mf|señor|señora}. ¿Has visto la estatua de fuera? Es difícil no verla; es visible a kilómetros. El Inmortal nos observa y, teniendo en cuenta que no ha hecho esta estación de pacotilla añicos, ni a este bar con ella, imagino que está conforme».
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is always with us, {mf|sir|ma'am}. Did you even see the statue outside? It's kinda hard to miss. The thing is visible through every crack. The Immortal One watches over us, and since He hasn't yet blown this sorry excuse for a station to smithereens — and this bar along with it — I guess it suits Him just fine."

traits.locale_text: «El {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} no nos abandona, {mf|señor|señora}. ¿Has visto la estatua de fuera? Es difícil no verla; es visible a kilómetros. El Inmortal nos observa y, teniendo en cuenta que no ha hecho esta estación de pacotilla añicos, ni a este bar con ella, imagino que está conforme».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}はいつでもあたしたちと共にいるよ、{mf|旦那|姉さん}。外の像は見た？嫌でも目に入るだろ。どこからでも見られるようになっているんだ。イモータルはいつだってあたしらを見守ってくださっていて、この残念なステーションもバーもまだ吹き飛ばされてない。皇帝も気に入ってくれてるみたいだね」
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is always with us, {mf|sir|ma'am}. Did you even see the statue outside? It's kinda hard to miss. The thing is visible through every crack. The Immortal One watches over us, and since He hasn't yet blown this sorry excuse for a station to smithereens — and this bar along with it — I guess it suits Him just fine."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}はいつでもあたしたちと共にいるよ、{mf|旦那|姉さん}。外の像は見た？嫌でも目に入るだろ。どこからでも見られるようになっているんだ。イモータルはいつだってあたしらを見守ってくださっていて、この残念なステーションもバーもまだ吹き飛ばされてない。皇帝も気に入ってくれてるみたいだね」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: "Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} ist immer bei uns, {mf|Sir|Madam}. Habt Ihr die Statue draußen nicht bemerkt? Sie ist schwer zu übersehen. Man erblickt das Ding durch jeden Riss. Der Unsterbliche wacht über uns, und nachdem er diese faule Ausrede für eine Station – und die Bar – noch nicht in die Luft gejagt hat, scheint er wohl kein Problem damit zu haben."
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is always with us, {mf|sir|ma'am}. Did you even see the statue outside? It's kinda hard to miss. The thing is visible through every crack. The Immortal One watches over us, and since He hasn't yet blown this sorry excuse for a station to smithereens — and this bar along with it — I guess it suits Him just fine."

traits.locale_text: "Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} ist immer bei uns, {mf|Sir|Madam}. Habt Ihr die Statue draußen nicht bemerkt? Sie ist schwer zu übersehen. Man erblickt das Ding durch jeden Riss. Der Unsterbliche wacht über uns, und nachdem er diese faule Ausrede für eine Station – und die Bar – noch nicht in die Luft gejagt hat, scheint er wohl kein Problem damit zu haben."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: « L'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} est toujours à nos côtés, {mf|m'sire|ma'ame}. Vous n'avez pas remarqué la statue, dehors ? Difficile de la rater pourtant, elle est visible à travers les moindres fissures. L'Immortel nous protège. Et puisqu'Il n'a pas encore jugé bon de faire exploser cette misérable station et son bar en mille morceaux, il faut croire que la situation Lui convient. »
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is always with us, {mf|sir|ma'am}. Did you even see the statue outside? It's kinda hard to miss. The thing is visible through every crack. The Immortal One watches over us, and since He hasn't yet blown this sorry excuse for a station to smithereens — and this bar along with it — I guess it suits Him just fine."

traits.locale_text: « L'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} est toujours à nos côtés, {mf|m'sire|ma'ame}. Vous n'avez pas remarqué la statue, dehors ? Difficile de la rater pourtant, elle est visible à travers les moindres fissures. L'Immortel nous protège. Et puisqu'Il n'a pas encore jugé bon de faire exploser cette misérable station et son bar en mille morceaux, il faut croire que la situation Lui convient. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} daima bizimle {mf|beyefendi|hanımefendi}. Dışarıdaki heykeli görmediniz mi? Gözünüze ilişmemesi imkânsız. Hangi delikten baksanız görülüyor zaten. Ölümsüz'ün gözü hep üzerimizdedir. İstasyon demeye bin şahit isteyen bu yüz karasını, içindeki bu barla beraber hâlâ tuzla buz etmediyse demek ki bizden memnun."
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is always with us, {mf|sir|ma'am}. Did you even see the statue outside? It's kinda hard to miss. The thing is visible through every crack. The Immortal One watches over us, and since He hasn't yet blown this sorry excuse for a station to smithereens — and this bar along with it — I guess it suits Him just fine."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} daima bizimle {mf|beyefendi|hanımefendi}. Dışarıdaki heykeli görmediniz mi? Görmemek elde değil. Nereden baksan görülüyor zaten. Ölümsüz'ün gözü üzerimizde. Madem O, güya istasyon adını taşıyan bu yüz karasını ve içindeki bu barı da tuz buz etmemiş, demek ki bizden gayet memnun."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana
